title: Characterization of a thermoelectric system based on a solar dish Stirling engine: a review
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00605D, Review Article
Lingxuan Kong, Zhibo Wu, Jiale Jiang, Jing Li, Ning Luo
The technical features of SDSS are summarized. Some novel technologies on SSDS are introduced. Parametric evaluations are carried out through four dimensions.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
